Superuser ถูกปิดใช้งานและถูกซ่อน
SuperSU จะเก็บสิทธิ์ Superuser ตลอดเวลา แม้กระทั้งผ่านการอัพเดท OTA (Over-the-air) ปิดก่อน NANDROID!

Do not show a toast notification when a program requests access (may be overridden per-app)
การเปลี่ยนแปลงที่ถูกกระทำสำหรับการตั้งค่านี้จะถูกใช้งานหลังจากรีสตาร์ทแอพฯ นี้
ทุกๆ แอพของฉัน
View all my apps available on Google Play
If cleanup succeeds, root will be lost, and this app will close automatically in a few seconds. Beware that some kernels automatically re-root at boot. Are you sure you want to continue ?
Cleanup to switch to another superuser app
"If cleanup succeeds, this app will close automatically in a few seconds. Afterwards, go into the other superuser app and make it update it's binary. Are you sure you want to continue ?"
ติดตั้งใหม่อีกครั้ง
Cleanup for reinstallation from Google Play
If cleanup succeeds, this app will close automatically in a few seconds. Afterwards, please reinstall SuperSU from Google Play. Are you sure you want to continue ?

Superuser command contents have not been logged for this entry. Full logging can be enabled for all apps by selecting Settings --> Logging --> Full content, or on a per-app bases by selecting the app in the apps listing.
The PIN code entered was not correct
The two PIN codes you entered did not match
Follow me on Twitter or G+
Stay up to date with my developments
Stay up to date with my developments, follow me on Twitter or Google Plus
ภาษาเริ่มต้น
SuperSU needs to be restarted for the language change to be activated (if the chosen language is supported)
Some apps are known to have problems will full content logging, these will ignore this setting. To enable full logging for these apps, use the per-app configuration dialog.
NOTICE: This app is known to have problems with full content logging !
NOTICE: This app is known to have problems with full content logging - the global log setting is ignored. Full logging can only be enabled through the per-app configuration dialog.
Converts SuperSU into a system app. You may need to repeat this process after an update
SuperSU is already a system app
Please reboot your device as soon as SuperSU closes. If it does not appear at all after boot, reinstall from Play
Allow processes running as system user to gain root access without confirmation
Even processes running as system user need confirmation to gain root

If cleanup succeeds, root will be lost, and this app will close automatically in a few seconds. Please reboot your device afterwards. Beware that some kernels automatically re-root at boot. Are you sure you want to continue ?

"If cleanup succeeds, this app will close automatically in a few seconds. Please reboot your device afterwards. After boot, go into the other superuser app and make it update it's binary. Are you sure you want to continue ?"
If cleanup succeeds, this app will close automatically in a few seconds. Please reboot your device afterwards. After boot, reinstall SuperSU from Google Play. Are you sure you want to continue ?
"Respect CM's root access setting (in Settings --> Developer Options)"
"Ignore CM's root access setting (in Settings --> Developer Options)"
Install an addon backup script that will let SuperSU surive CM updates and nightlies
SuperSU must be installed in /system for this feature (see above)
Note: not all languages are supported
If you make SuperSU invisible, you will not be able to open SuperSU configuration. Are you sure you want to continue ?
Note: not all themes are supported on all devices
SuperSU needs to be restarted for the theme change to be activated (if the chosen theme is supported)
Setting the countdown to longer than 10 seconds may cause crashes in badly-written apps
Automatically refresh apps and logs tabs as new entries are added. Detection depends on access and notification settings
Apps and logs tabs are not automatically refreshed
A nag message will be appended to notifications
No message will be appended to notifications
We need to do some clean-up and reboot before we can convert to a system app, to prevent data loss. After the device reboots (if the app just closes, reboot manually), please retry this option.
Only the primary user has root access
For multi-user support to work, you need to make sure that all users have SuperSU installed. It is advised to install SuperSU into /system, if you have not already done so.
Multi-user support is currently disabled. Only the primary user can use SuperSU. The primary user can enable multi-user support in SuperSU settings.
Only the primary user can configure this feature
If you have a custom recovery like TWRP or CWM, that can be used to (try to) install the SU binary. This is recommended for HTC devices. How would you like to install the SU binary ?
SuperSU will attempt to reboot your device into TWRP or CWM. This does not work on all devices. If this app just closes, please reboot into recovery manually.
full permissions to all device features and storage
Grants full access to all device features and storage, including the secure and sensitive hardware elements of your device. This permission is potentially dangerous.
Display warning if android.permission.ACCESS_SUPERUSER permission not declared in manifest
Do not display any warnings about missing android.permission.ACCESS_SUPERUSER permissions
Grants full access to all device features and storage, potentially dangerous
Developer: android.permission. ACCESS_SUPERUSER not declared in manifest
All Pro features are enabled, even if you did not purchase SuperSU Pro
Pro features do not work unless you purchase SuperSU Pro
SuperSU needs to be restarted for the changes to take effect
Other superuser apps aside from SuperSU have been detected. This may cause conflicts! Attempt to uninstall them?
Removes other superuser apps that may be installed and can cause conflicts

"There is no SU binary installed, and SuperSU cannot install it. This is a problem!
If you just upgraded to Android 4.3, you need to manually re-root - consult the relevant forums for your device!"
